Flow.interviewLabel: Application, License, Permit - Upload Submission Requests {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Application, License, Permit - Upload Submission Requests

recordLookups.name: Get_Fees
recordLookups.label: Get Fees
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7) OR (8 AND 4 AND 7)

recordLookups.name: Get_Pending_Submissions
recordLookups.label: Get Pending Submissions
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7) OR (8 AND 9 AND 10)

recordLookups.name: Get_Remaining_Submissions
recordLookups.label: Get Remaining Submissions
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 AND 4 AND 5 AND 11) OR (2 AND 4 AND 6 AND 11) OR (3 AND 4 AND 7 AND 11) OR (8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11)

fields.name: Determine_Upload_or_Logging_Display
fields.fieldText: Below are the submissions which still need to be satisfied for {!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Application2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Permit2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__License2__r.Name}. If you would like to upload the documents to these submissions, click Upload Document; otherwise, click Set Document Location. Once you have uploaded the document or set the document's location, the status of the submission will be updated to Completed and the submission date will be updated to the date the activity was completed.

screens.name: No_Pending_Submission_Requests_Pending_Fees_Screen
screens.label: No Pending Submission Requests & Pending Fees Screen

fields.name: No_Pending_Submission_Requests_Pending_Fees_Display
fields.fieldText:
Upload Submission Requests


You have successfully uploaded documents or set a document location for submission request(s) related to {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Application2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Permit2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__License2__r.Name}.


Click Finish to end the Flow and reload any additional, outstanding submissions. Otherwise, you may close the screen.

fields.name: No_Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Upload Submission Requests


There are no pending submission requests for {!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Application2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Permit2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__License2__r.Name}.

fields.name: Pending_Submissions_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Upload Submission Requests


Below are the outstanding submission requests for {!Get_Permit_Name.Name}{!Get_Application_Name.Name}{!Get_License_Name.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Application2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__Permit2__r.Name}{!Milestone.MUSW__License2__r.Name}. To upload files, click Upload Files or drag and drop files into the appropriate submission request. When uploading, ensure that each document is no larger than 1GB in size. You may upload up to ten (10) documents at a time for a submission request.


If you uploaded the wrong file, click the red X (x) to remove the file. Once you are done, click Next. Once you click next, you will be unable to remove the attached document. All required submission requests must be satisfied.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Determine_Upload_or_Logging_Display
fields.fieldText: Set a Document's location by selecting a Document Location value.

variables.description: Output Boolean of SubmissionRequestFileUpload to determine if pending submissions exist
variables.name: Pending_Submissions_Boolean
